title: too many rage in oce cause less consequences
body: I think that there are too many ragers since there is almost no consequences  and the oce tribunal system doesnt really work well i hope this gets fix because i want to play a game without getting 1 ass who complains on everything the other 3 teammates and i do

replies.body: I'm sick of people complaining on boards. that's what a diary is for.

True, but public speaking and broadcasting a common disapproval of something is a very common thing that has happened throughout the course of history. if anything it has usually meant change in one form or another.

the reason its mostly us bronze/silver players who post this kind of stuff is because were also the majority of the game ( 75% at a guess? )
yes, theres lots of rage in oce, I have to agree wid u on dat
